Packages
de.gianfelice.aeskulab Contains the main application and core classes.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.data.container Contains all containers, that are used to display and manage data in this application.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.data.entities Contains all entities for strategic use of this application.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.data.table Provides different classes to display data inside a table.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system Provides core functionalities like User-Handling, Session-Management and different utilities.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system.authentication Contains a user-object and a utility to authenticate it.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system.persistence Provides all classes that are necessary to save objects to a database.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system.utils Provides different utilities.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui Contains all UI components by this application.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.components Contains different UI-Components that are often used in the application.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.login Everything related to UI and login or creating the first user is packed within this package.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.tabs Contains all tabs and their contents.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.tabs.mainmenu Contains UI-classes for managing events.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.tabs.map Contains UI-classes for the tactic overview.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.tabs.units Provides UI-classes for managing units.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.tabs.user Contains all classes for the user-managment.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.top Provides UI components related to the top main menu.
de.gianfelice.aeskulab.ui.top.buttons Contains all buttons of the top menu.
